column4: Hello. Why is it that I am unable to set the permissions for a folder in the /host directory in such a way that I can access them with my normal user account?
what filesystem is in use for /host/ ?
I think it is NTFS. It is the partition that came with this Windows 7 computer.
thats why then, you dont chown/chmod ntfs or vfat on a file.folder basis,. you set the options when you mount them
